name: The Treachery of Game Dev
description:
Ce n'est pas un clone de Snake.

Created for Ludum Dare 38

With a game by carcass

  • v0.9: original Ludum Dare #38 jam version
  • v0.9.1: minor improvements to the jam version
  • v0.9.2: other small fixes, and now supports 4K
  • v0.9.3: Mac build (hopefully) works now, added menu with options (volume, mouse sensitivity, brightness), small performance optimizations

Credits: Music by Chill Carrier / some textures from textures.com
